programme.desc: Ann sets Leslie up on a blind date with a co-worker, which does not go as well as Leslie hoped. An old friend of Ann's makes Mark feel insecure.

programme.desc: Leslie discovers that the Parks Department budget is about to be cut, and she later meets the City Council member she is running to replace. Chris and Ron visit a meditation center.

programme.desc: Leslie is torn between Ben and her dreams of running for public office, while Ron braces himself for the arrival of his first wife, the original Tammy.

programme.desc: Wilhelmina tries to becomes part of the Meade family by any means necessary. Amanda withholds evidence and Betty applies a deadly perfume made by Fey Sommers.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie realizes that the department has forgotten Jerry's birthday and decides to throw a party for him at a special location. Meanwhile, Tom is flabbergasted when he finds out Ann doesn't share his taste in music.

programme.desc: Jerry’s contribution to Leslie’s community art show causes a stir. Ben moves in with April and Andy and attempts to teach them how to be adults. Meanwhile, Leslie is frustrated by Chris and his interoffice dating rules.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation

programme.desc: When Leslie hears her mom’s story about an old flame, she and her boyfriend Justin track him down and reunite them on Valentine’s Day. Meanwhile, Andy and his band are nervous about playing a gig at the Senior Center.

programme.desc: After seeing her working relationship with Daniel, her close friendship with Christina, and her chance to date Henry all fall apart, Betty is left with no choice but to turn her back on all three. programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty uses her Queens connections to lure big time photographer Vincent Bianchi to shoot for the magazine. programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie is outraged when Ron wins a “Woman of the Year” award for a project she started. Meanwhile, Tom is desperate to find some money to invest in a local Pawnee club.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: After an amazing date with Justin in Indianapolis, Leslie tries to impress him with a dinner party at her house.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty is left alone during an important photo shoot during which the photographer, Bruno, has come up with questionable concepts. Meanwhile, Daniel wants people to believe he is a family man, Mr. Green interrogates a mortician about the remains of a client and Ignacio gets in trouble with Immigration and Customs.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Daniel reconnects with Grace Chin, a girl he once stood up for a date in college, and who is now New York City's top lawyer. Meanwhile, Betty befriends Charlie, an out-of-towner she meets at the Mode cafeteria, whom she later discovers to be Henry's girlfriend.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie goes toe-to-toe with Bobby Newport in a debate. Ann, Tom, and Chris work in the media spin room, while Ron goes the extra mile to save a party for Leslie's donors.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty meets a look-a-like -- Ruthie, an editorial assistant at MYW Magazine who dresses and looks like her. Meanwhile, Daniel is in for a surprising revelation from Sofia that leaves everyone stunned.

programme.desc: It's election day in Pawnee, and Leslie and Bobby Newport are separated by a razor-thin margin. While everyone waits with Leslie for the race to be called, they ponder their futures, and their new opportunities.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: As Wilhelmina prepares for her flamboyant wedding, she quickly realizes that her maid of honor, Victoria Beckham, is stealing all her thunder. Meanwhile, Betty is filled with guilt about her pact with Wilhelmina to keep the latter's affair a secret and Ignacio prepares for his big day as he is about to become an official U.S. citizen. However, when Betty moves in with Henry the father/daughter relationship is strained.

programme.title: Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will attends Uncle Phil's Black fraternity event and finds his groove with his family and peers.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie tries an online dating service, but doesn't end up with a stranger as she expects. Also, Chris challenges Ron to a grilling competition as part of his plans to make Pawnee healthier.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Indiana government worker Leslie Knope is given the assignment to convert an abandoned quarry pit into a community park. A documentary film crew follows Leslie through her mishaps and gaffes as she tries to make her assignment a reality.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Christina's swag lottery, with the Mode closet clothes and accessories, creates a feeding frenzy among the office fashionistas, while Betty wears herself out helping Daniel who had his credit card cut off, because of a $20,000 expense report that Betty filled and who was rejected, making it impossible for him to wine and dine an important Japanese designer, Oshi.

programme.title: Bel-Air
programme.desc: The Banks family goes to church. Will considers taking the opportunity to find his father, unknowingly driving a wedge between Phil and Geoffrey.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie, Ann and the rest of the Parks Department volunteer to help the organization KaBOOM! build a playground for a neighboring town. After building an entire playground in one day, Leslie gets frustrated at the lack of progress with the pit, and takes some advice from Mark to cut through the red tape.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie is upset when she learns the library department wants to take over her lot. Making matters worse, the library is run by Ron's ex-wife Tammy, who still has a powerful emotional hold on him. Meanwhile, Andy gets a job in hopes of winning Ann back.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: When a possum bites the mayor's dog on a golf course, Leslie is asked to form a task force to catch the pesky animal. Meanwhile, Ron is upset when Mark refuses to bend the rules for him.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie tries to prove she can hang with the guys so she invites herself on Ron’s annual hunting trip, but things don’t go as planned. Meanwhile, April and Andy bond in the office while everyone is away.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie has to face an ethics committee about her secret relationship with Ben after they come clean to Chris.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Wilhelmina deals with the strong character of her daughter while Betty and Hilda try to gather $20,000 to save their father from deportation.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie and Ben host a bowling night after receiving feedback about Leslie's campaign. April, Chris, and Jerry hold a competition to see who can raise the most funds.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty gets into trouble in her writing class when she submits a pre-written MODE story written by a woman who survived a bear attack (hence the title). Alexis returns to work, still with memory loss and having no idea how to act like a girl. Daniel receives a threat from their top advertiser who is against transsexuals and wants Daniel to fire his own sister. Amanda, still trying to figure out who her real father is, learns a shocking secret about Wilhelmina's past.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: The Suarez family travel to Mexico in a effort to help Ignacio obtain a US Visa and find out more about their true family roots, especially Ignacio's real identity.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: When Ben prevents Leslie from holding a children’s concert, she takes matters into her own hands. Mark makes some big decisions about his life, and Andy gets some unexpected romantic attention.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: After Leslie finds out that Tom is getting a divorce, the department takes him out on the town to cheer him up. Meanwhile, Andy tries to hustle Mark in a game of pool.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty gets a little overwhelmed about Wilhelmina's brand new hunky bodyguard. Plus, Henry returns to pay for insurance, which has Betty concerned about their relationship. Because of the fatal crash, Alexis gets amnesia and Bradford uses it to his advantage. Hilda comes to terms with recent events. And Amanda gets a surprise inheritance from her late biological mother.

programme.title: Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will’s father shows up and tells the truth about where he’s been, exposing a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie works to find Ann a Valentine's date. Ron helps Ben with a scavenger hunt, and Chris becomes depressed over his love life.

programme.title: Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will finds he doesn’t fit in at his new school; the Banks family starts to adjust to life with Will.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Following the wedding fiasco, Wilhelmina wastes no time and plots her next move to conquer Mode. Meanwhile, Betty tries her best to regain Daniel's affections.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Ron's first ex-wife, Tammy One, reenters his life and tries to control his every move. Meanwhile, Ben helps Tom balance the books at his new company, and Ann makes a PSA, with help from Chris.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty is in for some wild drama when Marc's mother stops by, given that the latter doesn't seem to know that her son is gay and Betty acts as his girlfriend to help him keep his secret. Meanwhile, Daniel and Alexis are forced to work together when Claire names them both co-editors-in-chief.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie hosts a late-night shift for a local telethon, and lands former Indiana Pacer Detlef Schrempf as a celebrity guest. Meanwhile, Mark has big plans for his relationship with Ann.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie and the parks team put together a memorial service for a dearly departed friend. Meanwhile, Tom makes a big life decision, while Chris reacts badly to a health problem.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie plays host to the Parks and Recreation department from Pawnee’s sister city, Boraqua, Venezuela, and is shocked at the cultural differences. Tom becomes an errand boy, and April plays hard to get.

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie arranges for a reporter to do a story about her park project, but she and her committee have the worst time staying on topic. She then calls Mark to help her save the story, but it ends up hurting more than helping. Meanwhile, Tom does all he can to suck up to his boss.

programme.title: Ugly Betty
programme.desc: Betty has always dreamed of working in the publishing world, but it seems as though there's no place for the non-thin and non-beautiful in the business. People already have their minds set in the idea that beautiful women are only the thin and perfect! Betty really wants a job in that wonderful, yet cruel, world. But can she really find a place in it?

programme.title: Parks And Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie attends what she believes is a business meeting with an elderly local government bigwig, unaware that her mother has secretly set her up on a blind date. Andy plays his first gig since breaking both of his legs in the pit.

programme.title: Bel-Air

programme.desc: Kawachi is continuing his training, but still hasn’t come up with an idea for what kind of bread he will submit for the contest preliminaries. Will he come up with something in time?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: When Soma's father, Joichiro, suddenly shows up on Polar Star Dormitory's doorstep, Soma finds out that his father was an alum of Totsuki Academy and Polar Star Dormitory. Joichiro challenges Soma to a cooking duel to find out how far his son has come. How will the family duel end?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: It’s time for Team Japan to face against Team France—Kayser! The Kayser brothers reveal their true form, and Gran Kayser has more special abilities than anyone could have imagined! And what’s worse, Kazuma might be disqualified for being late!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The day of the Regiment de Cuisine is here! Soma has selected 8 best members to defeat the Central! After Azami and Erina’s discussion, it was decided that Soma, Isshiki and Megishima will fight in the 1st BOUT. Soma is up against Kinokuni Nene, the 6th seat in Central and also an expert in “soba” noodles! What will the shokugeki theme be!?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: It's the Main Store!! Dancing Meister!
programme.desc: Manager Matsushiro challenges the manager of St. Pierre’s main store, Mokoyama, to a bread battle, which will be broadcast live. Can Kazuma win with his Ja-pan?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Akira's dish, which on top of its powerful fragrance also uses the power of holy basil and yogurt, earns a score of 94 from the judges, two of which gave him a perfect 20. Finally, Soma presents his own fragrance bomb, combining his past two failures into a curry risotto omurice containing a mango chutney that deepens the flavor. The dish earns Soma 93 points, landing him second place behind Akira, though it is noted that three of the five judges ranked the dish higher than Akira's. As the contestants hold an afterparty celebrating and lamenting their victories and losses in the preliminaries, Soma becomes determined to improve his cooking finesse.

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti
programme.desc: This is Shiina. I can't believe it's already New Year's Eve, with all the fun I've had with Machiko-san and Morino-san this year just flew by. It's too bad I can't spend the evening with them, but it's a family tradition to ring in the new year at home, together.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Sticky Showdown!! Azuma Kazuma VS Kanmuri Shigeru!
programme.desc: It's the finals of the Pantasia Newcomers Battle! Can Azuma truly win without his petolite board? He seems to have a unique plan in mind, but with this unique plan for Japan #60. Additionally, what happens to Kyousuke after he finds the St.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: This is the Path I Must Take!? The Road of the Loquat!
programme.desc: Kazuma has been thrust into a fantasy world, and most take the “loquat” to the fires of a volcano and destroy it before the evil Snowza can use it to take over the world! This sounds an awful lot like a certain story about a ring…Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma battles with the First Seat of the Totsuki Elite Ten, Tsukasa. If Soma loses, he has to join Central and Tsukasa wagers seat in the Elite Ten. Their topic is French cuisine using venison. However, Soma pulls out an unlikely ingredient and a bizarre tool. The judges for this battle end up being Erina, Megumi, and Hisako who thought they were hiding, but were found. Who will be the victor in this battle that could greatly change both of their lives?

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Everyday life on the ship resumes, until the crew take on an arduous task and Takita goes overboard. Injured, she receives some unexpected help.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma faces off against Alice in the Fall Elections. The theme: bento! Alice specializes in molecular gastronomy. How will each draw on their expertise to craft the ultimate bento?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Fully aware of how deep curry can go through their encounter with Hayama, Soma and Megumi join the other first-years in preparing for the Autumn Elections over the rest of the summer. Now, the time has finally come for the preliminaries...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Excitement rises as the judges arrive at the venue of the Regiment de Cuisine. Isshiki is up against the 8th seat and Italian cuisine specialist Shiratsu Julio! His rivalry for Isshiki is apparent but what’s the reason behind it? Julio’s dish is ready first! What will the judges reaction be!?

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Chilchuck figures out a way to escape the dungeon, but their ascent is halted by an unexpected encounter with an old friend in dire need of sustenance.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Sibling Showdown!! The First Class Man Chosen by Dad!
programme.desc: It’s a showdown between estranged brothers. Neither wants to succeed, because both love cooking. Will their thoughts reach their father?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Hattori Surprise!! Transformation With the Secret Sauce!
programme.desc:
The bread battle has begun! Mokoyama unveils his ridiculously sweet Kouign Pudding Amman, which the judges give a perfect score! Does Kazuma’s Ja-pan stand a chance?
Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Inui Hinako, a Totsuki alumna, has tasked Soma's group with making a Japanese dish using available ingredients in the area. Anything other than condiments and spices must be procured from their immediate environs. Soma, provoked by Takumi Aldini's challenge, has a flash of inspiration and dashes out with Megumi to find ingredients for their dish!

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Disaster strikes the city as a rival ship fails to subdue a dragon. The Quin Zaza crew comes to the rescue despite Mika's ulterior motives.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Pierrot Arrested! Bows Between Love and Bread!
programme.desc: It’s time for the judging! It’s Suwabara’s golden P’ain D’or against Monico’s beautiful five-layered flower bread. Before giving the results though, Pierrot turns himself into the police!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Fall Elections Finals are finally here, with a historic face-off between three finalists at once. While Hayama and Kurokiba produce fresh pacific saury glinting like swords, Soma's pacific saury is a bit different…

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Azami Nakiri turns up to the battle venue and announces that he will be involved as a judge for this round! Rebels are outraged but even Senzaemon, who is supposed to be on their side, agrees to this change. With everyone confused, Takumi's and Rindo’s dishes are ready to be served!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Great Decisive Battle!! Koala's Dragon vs. Kazuma's Turtle!
programme.desc: Koala’s bread is a dragon and Kazuma’s bread… is in the shape of a turtle? Which will be victorious?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Reunion at the VIP seat!! Heaven Again
programme.desc: Pierrot is at death’s door and everyone is scrambling to save him! However, he has a rare blood type and no one knows any donors… but what’s this? The King has the same blood type?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The 4th round between Takumi Aldini and Mimasaka Subaru unexpectedly becomes a shokugeki. Takumi's bruised pride ignites his desire to beat Mimasaka, but Mimasaka starts making the exact same dish as Takumi…

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Round 2 has finally concluded--who will emerge victorious? Round 3 also begins, pitting the favored candidate, Hayama Akira, against Nakiri Erina's aide, Arato Hisako!

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Reaching the third level of the dungeon, Senshi leads the crew to his secret vegetable garden. Later, they are accosted by a band of angry, desperate orcs.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The 3rd round of the Advancement Exam begins with Soma vs new member of the Elite Ten, Hayama! Soma throws everything he’s got into his ultimately delicious Bear Menchi Katsu, which seemed like a winning dish already. In that situation, Hayama’s bear meat dish is finally revealed! A bear dish prepared with Hayama’s extremely acute sense of smell blows judges away and even makes them admit that it surpasses Soma’s dish! However, Soma’s eyes still shine with hope. What will his next move be!?

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: After a crushing loss, Laios, Marcille, and Chilchuck quickly reenter the dungeon to save Falin, but this time, they have a foolproof survival plan.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Nightmarish Semi-Finals!! Yukino's Despicable Trap!
programme.desc: It’s time for the semifinals! Kawachi is up against scientific genius Shigeru Kanmuri. Kawachi is feeling confident, but something seems to be wrong with his dough…Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma recklessly challenges Shinomiya to a Shokugeki in order to have him retract his decision to expel Megumi. Shinomiya refuses, but Dojima half forces him to accept. However, Dojima also imposes a condition on Soma and Megumi--Megumi must be the main chef! If they lose, Soma will also be expelled. The unofficial Shokougeki is about to begin!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Great Battles in Special Localities!! In the End, He's a Pop Idol!
programme.desc: The first opponent that Kazuma and the others face is the enigmatic Takumi Tsubozuka, a member of CMAP, a team of celebrity chefs. Can Kazuma, Kawachi, and Kanmuri come up with a bread that will defeat Tsubozuka and make use of Oma’s local ingredients?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The training camp is considered the first trial by fire for students in Totsuki's high school division. Dozens of students are said to be expelled and sent away every day, and the number of students is said to be reduced below half by the camp's end. Intent on survival, Soma and his friends embark on their journey to the hellish camp in one of Totsuki Resorts' hotels.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma finds out that Totsuki has a school festival that happens at the end of autumn called the Moon Festival. Soma is told by the 8th seat of the Elite Ten, Kuga, that if he’s able to beat him in any dish there, he’ll accept a Shokugeki from him and Soma decides to enter the Moon Festival so he can challenge him. He then goes to Kuga’s Chinese Food RS and sees...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: After passing the 1st exam, Soma and others are moving onto the 2nd exam! The next theme is “noodle dish”! However, they face another obstruction from the Central! When it's their time to cook, all the noodles were used up. Although the regulation is to “procure any missing ingredients yourself”, they are stranded in the rural mountain side venue and are also grounded with heavy snow! How will Soma and friends get through this!?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: With Alice and Hisako's help, Erina escaped from her family home and came to Polar Star Dormitory. Meanwhile, Azami establishes Central, whose members will solely consist of students he personally finds worthy. In addition, he announces the dissolution of research groups, research societies, and clubs! Polar Star Dormitory is also on the list...

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Pierrot's Miscalculation!! How the Last Dinner Tastes
programme.desc: After rescuing Kazuma and the others, Pierrot leads everyone to an underground lake. He promises everyone that he’ll swim outside and find help, but there’s one problem... he can’t swim! Can Pierrot get out of it, or did he bite off more than he could chew?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Back at camp, Senshi finally reveals his painful history with the dungeon. The next day, the crew is rudely awakened by a perplexing transformation.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The final day of the Moon Festival is here. Soma and Kuga's battle finally draws to a close--who will emerge the victor? After closing up shop in the Central Area, Soma and Megumi accept Rindo's invitation to go to Tsukasa Eishi's booth in the Yamanote Area! What kind of food will be served by the first seat?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: A Dive into Hell!! A New Scheme!
programme.desc: After surviving the incident on the island, Team Japan lives to fight another day. Because the last round’s results were annulled, a rematch will be held in Mexico. But something seems off about those professional skydivers hired for the match…Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: With Soma declared victor in the first match, it is now Megumi's turn to rise to the occasion. The theme is ramen, and her opponent is Kurokiba Ryo. What will these complete opposites in personalities and cooking styles choose for their ramen broth?

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Leaving the safety of the Golden Country, Senshi ends up in the clutches of a ferocious griffin. The crew must summon help if they want to save him.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Close Attack!! The Birth of the Black Japan!
programme.desc: Yukino hires three specialists from the St. Pierre branch in Kyushu who are able to copy any kind of bread. Can Kazuma’s Black Ja-pan counter their threat and expose Yukino for the villain she is?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: The Quin Zaza prepares to make a long-awaited landfall in the city of Quon. But another ship's distress signal puts them in the path of air pirates.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Love also Rescues Saito!! Solar Hands vs the Flame Arm!
programme.desc: CMAP not only has incredible knowledge and unbeatable talent, but one of their members even has the Arms of Flame, which burn even hotter than Kazuma’s Hands of the Sun! Will Kazuma’s love of good food and good friends be enough?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Under his father's orders, Soma attempts to transfer into one of Japan's top culinary schools, Togetsu Tea House Culinary Academy. His examiner, Nakiri Erina, is a student said to possess humanity's best palate: the God Tongue.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Autumn Elections preliminaries have finally begun! Only four students from each group can advance to the main tournament. In Soma's Group A, the favored candidates get all the attention while Soma toils on. Meanwhile in Group B, Megumi is passed over by everyone as being uninteresting, but then she suddenly pulls out a unique ingredient...

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: It’s Kazuma and Kawachi’s first day of work at Pantasia’s South Tokyo, but before they can be recognized as true bread artisans, they must satisfy the manager’s request to make a bread that even a horse will eat.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti
programme.desc: Dear grandma, it's me, Ryou. I'm sure you can hear me up in heaven. I'm doing all right on my own thanks to all the things you passed on to me.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Izutsumi proves to be a useful ally despite her lousy table manners — and aversion to eating monsters. But the crew's kindness slowly opens her up.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Something's fishy on this new dungeon level! The crew crosses a treacherous lake, encountering vicious seafood and fallen adventurers along the way.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: The crew continue their efforts to put down the rampaging dragon. Giraud takes matters into his own hands in order to protect the city.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Cutting Edge Cuisine RS was able to defeat Central. However, other organizations who suffered defeat have been shut down, strengthening Central's control over the academy. Meanwhile, the First Seat happens to become the substitute instructor in Soma's class, and Soma volunteers to be his assistant...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Only one more day of being a Stagiaire at SHINO's Tokyo. Soma continues to learn various things about French cuisine and is able to participate in the employee competition. Will Soma be able to impress Shinomiya with his dish and will he pass his Stagiaire course?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: One win for the Central and one win for the rebels! The shokugeki between Isshiki and Tsukasa reaches its climax! The theme was a classical French ingredient, rabbit meat. Isshiki’s dish manage to impress the judges but Tsukasa seems to be unmoved. Will Tsukasa be able to surpass Isshiki’s super aggressive dish?

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: With the dungeon's fate hanging in the balance, Kabru negotiates with the elves. Meanwhile, a ghost drags Laios and crew into the cursed Golden Country.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: To Whom Will You Give Your Truly Delicious Bread!? The Ja-pan, Forever!
programme.desc: The final showdown. Kazuma faces off against Yuichi Kirisaki’s son in a legendary battle in Kazuma’s own hometown. However, Kazuma won’t just have to win over Kuroyanagi - Yuichi Kirisaki and Pierrot also step up to the plate as judges!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma arrives at Polar Star Dormitory with high expectations, only to find it a creepy, run-down place. He is then informed by the dorm warden, Daimido Fumio, that he can only live at the dorm after he impresses her with his cooking. Soma rises up to the challenge!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Indomitable Fighting Spirit!! Use Adversity as a Springboard to Success!
programme.desc: Kawachi’s dough won’t ferment despite his best efforts and he collapses after become exhausted. What could have been the cause? Does South Tokyo stand a chance against such foul play?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: With the survival of Cutting Edge Cuisine RS on the line, Kurokiba and Kusunoki's shokugeki begins. Not only does Kusunoki prepare the key ingredient, salmon, with the same skill as Kurokiba, but he also pulls out a steam convection oven. How will Kurokiba counter Kusunoki's expertise in cutting edge culinary skills?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The advancement exam continues. In the 3rd exam, students are to battle Totsuki Elite Ten members! Soma is up against none other than Hayama, who joined the council recently. Their exam will begin in 3 days’ time, with “bear meat” as its theme. Soma goes straight into trials but because of its distinct smell, bear meat is proven more difficult to handle. As Soma tackles bear meat fruitlessly, an unexpected person comes to his aid…!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Garbage and Trash!! Kazuma Selected the Worst Possible Butter!
programme.desc: For their first task, Kazuma and Kawachi must make a butter roll… but Kazuma chose the worst possible butter for the assignment! Can he possibly make anything good enough to pass?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Maharajah!! The Day Mount Fuji Fell!
programme.desc: At the beginning of the episode, Azuma quickly loses another 2 points for his hair being messy & another 2 for (inadvertently) insulting the examiner. He is given a hairband by a girl who is in the competition. Azuma then meets Kawachi Kyosuke, another applicant. Compared to Azuma, who is relatively simple and has only ever made Japan (bread), Kawachi is quite knowledgeable about bread. As he sees Azuma kneading his bread, he determines that Azuma has the Solar Hands. After tasting a sample of Azuma's bread, he realizes that Azuma is strong competition and must lose quickly. While Azuma is preparing his dough, he rolls a rolling pin behind Azuma, which Azuma slips on, ruining his bread. However, Azuma rebounds to make a Mount Fuji-shaped bread, and gains two points back - comparatively, the strongest competitor otherwise, Suwabara Kai, has a zero point deduction.

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc:
While in pursuit of Falin, Laios and crew seek shelter from a blizzard but are overrun by Shapeshifter copies of themselves. How will they spot the fakes?
Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: After conquering Team France, Team Japan is feeling confident, but another threat looms overhead: Team America. They’ve faced Spencer Henry Hoko before, but just who are Shadow and Monica?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The heated battle enters 4th BOUT! The remaining 3 Central members are Tsukasa, Rindo and Momo. With stakes at the highest, the rebel team goes all-out with their best, too: Isshiki, Takumi and Erina! Erina finally joins the battle and she is up against Momo! The unlosable battle begins..!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The 1st years at the Totsuki Culinary Institute are facing the biggest event of the 2nd semester, “The Advancement Exam”! However, the mood is gloomy at Polar Star dormitory as it is rumored that those who won't obey Azami's regime will face elimination. As Soma reflects on the situation, he is visited by Erina. When he hears her thoughts, he starts to cook a “Yukihira dish” and make her taste it…!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: And Now, It's France! Aim for the Monaco Cup!
programme.desc: Kazuma, Kawachi, and Suwabara depart for France to train under Meister Kirisaki’s younger sister, Sophie. But when they learn that her bakery is being threatened, they decide to help her fight!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: As another group of adventurers discovers a treasure box, a swarm of bone-chilling ghosts chases Laios and his crew. Senshi, however, has a sweet plan.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Before the Finals!! A Dark Shadow Approaches Kazuma
programme.desc: Before he faces Suwabara, the strongest of the rookies, Mr. Matsushiro tells Kawachi to go train at St. Andrew’s church. Meanwhile, Yukino breaks Kazuma’s petalite stone!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The match between Takumi and Eizan comes to an end and there’s only one pair left: Soma is up against Saito, who overcame Mimasaka’s Perfect Trace! What will they cook, using the theme of their battle, “butter”?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The advancement exam traditionally takes place in Hokkaido every year. With theme of the exam being Hokkaido ingredients, Erina is to hold a special lesson on Hokkaido to the Polar Star members. With extra hard training, they are now ready for the exam. Soma and others arrive in Hakodate. The 1st exam shortly begins; however, they are already facing the interference from the Central Gourmet Organization…!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma is optimistic about the finals because of his family diner's longstanding history with pacific saury as a menu item. However, his confidence is soon crushed when he realizes that Hayama and Kurokiba are far more skilled at selecting the best pacific saury the fish market has to offer. Can Soma overcome this major disadvantage?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: What Was That?! Kawachi, a Man's Hard Training!
programme.desc: The villainous Yukino, true to her word, destroys Kanmuri’s lab after he loses to Kazuma. Meanwhile, the match between Suwabara and Kawachi is about to begin!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: He Has Arrived!! The Boy Who Possesses Solar Hands!
programme.desc: Azuma Kazuma is an aspiring baker who has left his small town for Tokyo to fight for his dream of making a bread for all Japan. The story starts when Azuma is 5, living in the country with his grandfather, a rice farmer, and his sister. Although his family only eats rice, as they are rice farmers, Azuma's sister wishes to eat bread for once. Azuma's grandfather refuses, and Azuma has to make a bread that even his grandfather will eat. Little do they know, Azuma has the legendary "Solar Hands". These allow bread to ferment more quickly, and he is able to make a bread that his grandfather loves. 10 years later, he travels to Tokyo to compete in the Pantasia recruitment competition, to try to get accepted to Pantasia, the best bakery in Japan. The test uses a 10 point system, but Azuma immediately loses 5 points due to being late...

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Challenge From Kirisaki! New Program Yakitate!! 9 Starts
programme.desc: Mr. Kirisaki has bought out Pantasia and merged it with St. Pierre! He then throws down to the gauntlet to Kazuma and the others by issuing them this challenge: If they want to save Pantasia, they must compete in his Yakitate 9 contest!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: The crew avoid a stinging descent to the castle town, where the Red Dragon lurks. But to defeat it, they need a tight plan — and a morale-boosting meal.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: 2nd BOUT of the Régiment du Cuisine is between Megishima & Rindo, Mimasaka & Saito and Kuga & Tsukasa! The theme of each team is "Chilli", "Tuna" and "Green Tea". Mimasaka shows off his new skill which he devised from working together in a team. The rebel team unite as one to defeat the new found Totsuki Elite Ten! Their dishes are both ready and judgement begins...!

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc:
Still wrestling with their new forms, the crew must overcome the gargoyles. Later, they descend deeper into the dungeon. What monsters will they try next?
Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Confuse the Universe!! Man who Succeeded Gopan
programme.desc: After tragically losing his father, Pierrot still carries on with the contest. But Shadow from Team America promises to reunite Pierrot with his mother with his Go-pan! Can Go-Pan send Pierrot to the Milky Way to meet his mother who died and became a star?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The battle continues in the Autumn Elections preliminaries. From Group B, Alice, Hisako, Takumi and Megumi all make it through. Meanwhile, in Group A, Sendawara Natsume keeps giving contestants 0's and no one has scored a high overall score. Next, Alice's aide, Kurokiba Ryo is up. The mysterious chef finally reveals his true colors!

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Back in an upper dungeon level, Kabru and crew wake up to find their supplies missing and are ambushed on their way back to the surface.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Not only will Yukihira face Mimasaka in the semi-finals, but the match will also be a shokugeki! Yukihira even tells Mimasaka what he'll prepare for the match--how does he plan to defeat Mimasaka's perfect profiling?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The unofficial Shokugeki between Shinomiya and the Megumi-Soma pair has begun. With expulsion on the line, the judging is underway. Megumi's first dish as the main chef is her own take on the nine-vegetable terrine Shinomiya assigned--the Rainbow Terrine, made from seven types of vegetables!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma thinks upon the circumstance of Shiomi Seminar’s closure and the reason why Hayama joined the Central without a fight. Dojima, who knew why Hayama joined the Elite Ten, tells Soma it was because Azami has been pulling the wires from behind. With that knowledge, Soma heads to where Hayama is! Finally, the day of the 3rd exam is here! Soma’s revenge match begins!!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Fearful Revenge!! The Panda Man Appears!
programme.desc: Mokoyama has returned a changed man. Though he doesn’t wish to assist Yukino or Mr. Kirisaki in any way, he desperately wants to prove his worth by displaying his new form, Panda Man, and his new weapon, Super Baking Powder!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: A Speed Contest!! Ping It with That!
programme.desc: For the quarterfinals, contestants have to make a bread in less than 60 minutes. Can it be done? Kazuma has the idea to use a microwave, but when Pierrot reveals he absolutely hates them, things don’t look good for Team Japan!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Pierrot Transcends Time!! Japan to the Top of the World!?
programme.desc: Kazuma’s Ja-pan #61 has sent Pierrot back 23 years in time! Can Pierrot save his parents and alter the course of history? Or will he be doomed to a tragic life?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: As the first semester draws to a close, the names of students who'll participate in the Autumn Elections are posted in Totsuki Academy. The assigned topic is a curry dish, leading Soma to seek out a certain alumna Joichiro told him about.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: Tsubozuka has become a friend of Kazuma and the others. But the other members of CMAP aren’t so forgiving. Now they’re dueling against Kazuma in Saito. How in the world can Kazuma beat three excellent bakers, and use a little clay haniwa statute to do it?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Meister, Taking Wing!! Who is to Win!?
programme.desc: Kazuma is up against Kanmuri! It’s time to see who will win! Their battle is overseen by the illustrious Meister Kirisaki, who gives Kanmuri a perfect score. Can Kazuma hope to win against a scientific genius who graduated from Harvard at a young age?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Great Dectective Piero!! Reaction that Gave Life!
programme.desc: Pierrot’s been stabbed! And Detective Conan showed up? What’s going on here? Has Kawachi been accused of murder?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Kuroyanagi in Danger!! The Lost Reactions!
programme.desc: After an accident, Kuroyanagi lost all sense of taste. Will he have to retire from being a judge forever? Meanwhile, Kazuma has to think of a way to defeat his old friend, Liu, in a match to make Chinese-style steamed buns!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Green Marvel!! It's the Magician Kazuma!
programme.desc: Kazuma is up against Koala, and the theme is to make an “animal” bread. Can Kazuma stand up against the powerful, mysterious Koala? Or will Koala secure victory for Mizuno?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: New to the airship, Takita struggles to find her place alongside eccentric draker Mika. The crew deals with stubborn locals and other scaly problems.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Hisako, Alice and Kurokiba all failed the third exam and were expelled! In desperation, Erina directly negotiates with Azami but her pleas are not taken seriously. Soma also challenges Azami for the seat at the Elite Ten. Like Erina, his challenge is also brushed away but the situation changes entirely when a certain person appears at the scene!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: 2nd BOUT between the new and old members of the Elite Ten continues. Megishima and Mimasaka have lost only by a fraction. Why is Kuga so tanaciously persistant on Tsukasa? What kind of dish will they make using "green tea"? 2nd BOUT comes to an end! The rebels enjoy short break but Momo, 3rd seat of the Elite Ten, visits them...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: During the FINAL BOUT, Soma challenges Erina to a Shokugeki. There is a hidden motive behind it: Soma wants Erina to put everything she’s got into her “Killer Dish”... As the time-limit draws nearer, Erina takes on Soma’s challenge and starts to prepare a new dish! What will Erina present as her “Killer Dish”?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Sun vs the Blizzard!! The Ultimate Tart Showdown!
programme.desc: Tsukino’s sister steps in to challenge Kazuma and the others in the semi-finals, in a match she is well-suited for: making tarts. After insulting a local fruit vendor, Kazuma decides to fight against her using the vendor’s specialty, preserved loquats!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Yukihira is a popular neighborhood restaurant where Yukihira Soma helps out in the hopes of surpassing his father as a chef one day. But land sharks are after their restaurant, and one day Soma tells them that the restaurant will close if they couldn't serve satisfactory food to their customers. The land sharks are only too happy to sabotage the restaurant's fridge and gleefully orders Soma to serve them a meat dish...

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: The Malotao assist with butchering and rendering the dragon's corpse. The smallest crew members get stuck with an icky job; Katja helps with cooking.

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: The crew's desperate search comes to a satisfying end, but when an unbelievable opportunity arrives, Takita takes care of some final business.

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Hijinks ensue when an intimate drawing of Vannie appears. Takita spends some time with her before Mika and a strange dragon cause an uproar.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Polar Star members have managed to survive the first day of camp. Megumi starts to build some confidence by successfully supporting Soma. But now, she and Soma have to face the second day with a genius of French cuisine, Shinomiya, who'd already expelled more than 30 students the day prior...

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti
programme.desc: Summary: It's Shiina again. Machiko-san and Morino-san both got through exams and it's time for graduation! Morino-san came to watch Machiko-san walk, she really does love her. I'm headed over to their place now with a special lunch from Tsuyuko-san. They're going to have a pretty hectic time adjusting to their new life, so I thought I'd bring it by and help out however I can.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Experimental, Historical, Supreme Bread!! It`s Japan #44!
programme.desc: After Kawachi’s horrible defeat, Kazuma vows to avenge him. So Kazuma uses a slab of petalite to make Ja-pan #44, a bread so delicious that the person who eats it will be whisked away to Heaven! Has Kazuma finally gotten serious?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti
programme.desc:
I'm Kirin. I'm going to prep school with Ryou on the weekends, and I promised I'd be her new family too.
Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: The crew lands in Quon. Takita gets new responsibilities, and Mika takes her to visit an old tribesman. Giraud takes a chance while out with the boys.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: I Hate Things that Turn!! Kai and Monica's Three-Legged Race!
programme.desc: The ninjas are revealed to be Kai and Monica, and Kai makes a shocking declaration. If he can’t defeat Kazuma, he’ll commit suicide! Will his determination let him finally beat Kazuma? And will he really go through with it if he loses?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Home to Diner Yukihira, Sumire Avenue Shopping District is on its last legs after the karaage specialty store, Mozuya, has taken all their customers. Soma recruits Kurase and Nikumi to help devise a plan to recoup customers: the Walk-n-Eat Karaage. The summer karaage campaign is about to begin!

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Takita struggles to eat her next meal. After Aschera brings her and their little companion to her people, she makes a serious decision.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The students have been tasked with creating an egg-based breakfast menu item for a buffet, and they must persuade guests to consume 200 servings before two hours' time. Soma's souffle omelets keep deflating before the guests have a chance to take the dish. With only 30 minutes remaining, Soma has served less than 10 guests--with defeat imminent, Soma recalls Joichiro's advice and decides to make a last-ditch effort to make a comeback!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Kanmuri's Secret!! A Jam Showdown Without Moral Codes
programme.desc: Kanmuri’s past is brought to light and he may have to retire from his life as a baker! Will he be forced to leave his friends at Pantasia and become… a gangster!? And what’s worse, after getting sick, Kazuma has to sit this match out!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Delii-cious!! The Trap of the Yakisoba Bread!
programme.desc: The theme of the next round is Yakisoba bread, and the twist is that challengers this round will cook the yakisoba. Kazuma, however, is a terrible cook, so Mr. Matsushiro recruits an old friend to teach Kazuma and Kawachi about the way of noodles.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: 23 years ago, Polar Star dormitory lead by Saiba Joichiro and Dojima Gin was known as the strongest of all Totsuki Academy. Joichiro’s creative dishes won many competitions and were recognized by many, however, he had an unsettling feeling inside him…

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma and Eizan begin the shokugeki that will determine the fate of Polar Star Dormitory. Hereto known more as a skilled consultant, Eizan's strengths as a chef will finally become known. The shokugeki's topic is Satsuma chicken from Kagoshima prefecture. However, the match is rigged due to Eizan having bought out all the judges. Does Soma have a fighting chance?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: After seeing the Chinese Food RS, Soma decides to put out a Chinese cuisine food stall at the Moon Festival to challenge Kuga. Meanwhile, Alice pairs up with Kurokiba and Hayama, and the others also start to prepare for the Moon Festival. Soma starts preparing a dish for his stand at the festival with the help of Megumi, but things aren’t going that well...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Régiment du Cuisine enters 3rd BOUT! Soma vs Saito, Takumi vs Eizan and Megumi vs Momo are the next round. The 3 members of the rebels study under famous chefs and Megumi is taken care by Shinomiya. However, her past experience with him bring back traumatic memories and she is unable to do her best. What made her come back to herself was... shojo comics!?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Third night of camp. Soma and the others manage to make it through their arduous trials. But now they're given a new trial for the next morning: to come up with a menu item that uses eggs.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Nude Nude Nude!! Magnificent Bread Battle!
programme.desc: Suwabara faces off against Monica Adenauer of Team America, who is revealed to be a world-champion patissier! Can he possibly beat her in making an artistic bread?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Trapped in the dungeon, a concerned Senshi cooks up a nourishing meal for the famished crew — giving Marcille enough energy to come up with a plan.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Régiment du Cuisine with the Central Gourmet organization lead by Azami Nakiri continues. The 1st BOUT was won by the Soma and the rebels! To keep the momentum going and secure more wins, the rebels place Kuga, Mimasaka and Megishima as their next cards. Central on the other hand, sends in First seat; Tsukasa, Second seat; Rindo and Fourth seat; Saito. With the best members of both team, 2nd BOUT is bound to throw off some sparks!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: More than half the Elite Ten Council have been turned by Erina's father, Nakiri Azami, and appointed him as Totsuki's new director! News of the regime change comes as a shock to the whole campus, and there is unease in the air. One day, Soma goes back to his room, only to find the former director, Senzaemon, waiting for him. Senzaemon begins to tell Soma about Erina's shocking past...

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Marcille recalls when she first met Falin as young students. After a quick wash up, an inadvertent misstep lands her in deep water with an angry spirit.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Clearing his first Stagiare with ease, Soma heads off to his next training location to find it is a new restaurant to be opened by Shinomiya Kojiro, his former shokugeki opponent. What awaits Soma in Shinomiya's French restaurant kitchen?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The preliminaries for the Autumn Elections have entered the judging phase for each group! Excitement's in the air in Group B's arena as Hisako, Takumi, Alice, and others score big with the judges. The final dish to be judged belongs to Megumi, whom no one has high hopes for. What will her dish be like?

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Falin starts acting strange in the middle of the night, leading Laios and crew to a menacing figure who wants them gone.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: After using a roulette table to determine ingredients, what could possibly come next? How about a slot machine? Suwabara steps up and wins a lot of coins at the slots, but things sound too good to be true… and what’s this about Lu-pan?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Though presumed inferior to Kurokiba's cartoccio and Hayama's carpaccio, Soma's pacific saury dish had been hiding a secret. Will Soma's strategy work to sway the judges

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The last Régiment du Cuisine begins! For the FINAL BOUT, each member from the team must complete 1 entree and 1 main dish to complete a course meal. Although team work is crucial to this battle, Soma and Erina continue to bicker on. On the other hand, the invincible pair Tsukasa and Rindo are ready to present their dishes…!

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Takita learns more about the business of draking. But when a strange dragon boards the ship, she takes matters into her own hands. Sort of.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: In order to prepare themselves for the upcoming Régiment du Cuisine, Soma and the others divide into 2 teams for practice battle. While they are not allowed to speak under the rule, the team leader Dojima prepares a dish but to everyone’s confusion, he improvises from the recipe. As Takumi tries to understand Dojima’s intention, he recalls back to the events at Stagiaire Challenge…

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Last Match of the Newcomers' Battle!! The Singing and Dancing French Breads!
programme.desc: Kawachi makes “Singing” French bread, while Suwabara rises to the challenge with his “Dancing” French bread. Will this match end with… a draw?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: The crew is cornered by an acquaintance who demands help with a beastly problem. Later, Laios enters Marcille's nightmare and discovers her greatest fear.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Miraculous Steamed Bread!! The Day Panda Became a Panda!
programme.desc: The hot springs battle is boiling over and things start getting really bombastic when Panda’s bread explodes… three times! How can this possibly be? Has Mokoyama made the bread he’s always dreamed of making?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.sub-title: Court Cuisine / Boiled in Salt Water
programme.desc: A starving Laios angers a mysterious elf while hunting for food in Living Paintings. Later, Chilchuck finds himself trapped with a crabby Mimic.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti
programme.desc: Ryou here! The weather's finally cooled off; autumn is here! Today we're going to a cookout atShiina-san's house. She and Kirin said they want to do something for me to pay back everything I've done for them. Kirin barely said hello before she ran off to Shiina-san's place! I'm happy that they're doing something nice for me, but at the same time it's a bit lonely being excluded. Plus, I'm not sure they can handle everything by themselves...Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: A desperate search within the dragon's stomach leads to a gruesome discovery, revealing that resurrection magic alone won't be enough to restore Falin.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: The crew finally faces the Red Dragon, but their grand strategy quickly unravels. With the beast's fury escalating, who will get the final bite?Source: Netflix

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Everyday life on the Quin Zaza is hectic but fun. As a violent storm sets in, Giraud tells Takita about the mythical glittering dragon.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: World-class Level!! The Roulette that Calls a Storm
programme.desc: The Monaco Cup has officially begun, and Team Japan’s fate rests on their luck with the roulette. Will they get the ingredients they need? Can they possibly make a bread just with eggs?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: The parties must band together to fend off an attack by vicious Harpies — but the unexpected appearance of a transformed Falin stuns everyone.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: A Traditional Taste! The Heart That Thinks of Japan is Just One!
programme.desc: It’s time for Kuroyanagi to decide who will win the sixth round: Kazuma or Norihei. Kuroyanagi delivers his most expressive reactions yet in a battle that leaves Kazuma and the others stunned!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma finds out that Totsuki has a school festival that happens at the end of autumn called the Moon Festival. Soma is told by the 8th seat of the Elite Ten, Kuga, that if he’s able to beat him in any dish there, he’ll accept a Shokugeki from him and Soma decides to enter the Moon Festival so he can challenge him. He then goes to Kuga’s Chinese Food RS and sees...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Moon Festival finally begins! The dish that Soma decides to make for his stand are black pepper pork buns that are made in a stone oven. However, the crowd keeps going over to the more luxorious Chinese cuisine RS's stand instead. Soma ends up in the red on the first day. Since students who end up with losses during this school festival will be expelled, Soma is already in trouble. Will he be able to turn things around?!

programme.title: Drifting Dragons
programme.desc: Takita struggles to eat her next meal. After Aschera brings her and their little companion to her people, she makes a serious decision.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Maharajah!! The Day Mount Fuji Fell!
programme.desc: At the beginning of the episode, Azuma quickly loses another 2 points for his hair being messy & another 2 for (inadvertently) insulting the examiner. He is given a hairband by a girl who is in the competition. Azuma then meets Kawachi Kyosuke, another applicant. Compared to Azuma, who is relatively simple and has only ever made Japan (bread), Kawachi is quite knowledgeable about bread. As he sees Azuma kneading his bread, he determines that Azuma has the Solar Hands. After tasting a sample of Azuma's bread, he realizes that Azuma is strong competition and must lose quickly. While Azuma is preparing his dough, he rolls a rolling pin behind Azuma, which Azuma slips on, ruining his bread. However, Azuma rebounds to make a Mount Fuji-shaped bread, and gains two points back - comparatively, the strongest competitor otherwise, Suwabara Kai, has a zero point deduction.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The battle continues in the Autumn Elections preliminaries. From Group B, Alice, Hisako, Takumi and Megumi all make it through. Meanwhile, in Group A, Sendawara Natsume keeps giving contestants 0's and no one has scored a high overall score. Next, Alice's aide, Kurokiba Ryo is up. The mysterious chef finally reveals his true colors!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)

programme.desc:
I'm Kirin. I'm going to prep school with Ryou on the weekends, and I promised I'd be her new family too.
Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The 3rd and final battle between Soma and Nene is heating up, as they are putting everything they've got in the dish! programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)

Excitement's in the air in Group B's arena as Hisako, Takumi, Alice, and others score big with the judges. The final dish to be judged belongs to Megumi, whom no one has high hopes for. What will her dish be like?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Sun vs the Blizzard!! The Ultimate Tart Showdown!
programme.desc: Tsukino’s sister steps in to challenge Kazuma and the others in the semi-finals, in a match she is well-suited for: making tarts. After insulting a local fruit vendor, Kazuma decides to fight against her using the vendor’s specialty, preserved loquats!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: After passing the 1st exam, Soma and others are moving onto the 2nd exam! The next theme is “noodle dish”! However, they face another obstruction from the Central! When it's their time to cook, all the noodles were used up. Although the regulation is to “procure any missing ingredients yourself”, they are stranded in the rural mountain side venue and are also grounded with heavy snow! How will Soma and friends get through this!?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.desc: Kazuma and Kawachi both try and find a way to make a bread that the manager’s horse will eat. Kawachi decides to use oats, while Kazuma makes butter.Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Between Megumi and Momo, who will concur over the 3rd BOUT of Régiment du Cuisine? Meanwhile, Takumi and Eizan prep for their "beef"-themed dish. While Takumi works on his version of Japanese traditional dish "shigureni", Eizan plays dirty behind his back in order to get advantage! Being cornered, what’s Takumi’s secret plan?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan

programme.desc: Kazuma is up against his most powerful foe yet, the famous TV celebrity and comedian Norihei Miki! Can Kazuma possibly compete against such a legend, especially when the theme involves using seaweed, Norihei’s specialty?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The 3rd round of the Advancement Exam begins with Soma vs new member of the Elite Ten, Hayama! A bear dish prepared with Hayama’s extremely acute sense of smell blows judges away and even makes them admit that it surpasses Soma’s dish! However, Soma’s eyes still shine with hope. What will his next move be!?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: As the first semester draws to a close, the names of students who'll participate in the Autumn Elections are posted in Totsuki Academy. The assigned topic is a curry dish, leading Soma to seek out a certain alumna Joichiro told him about.

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: Reunion at the VIP seat!! Heaven Again
programme.desc: Pierrot is at death’s door and everyone is scrambling to save him! However, he has a rare blood type and no one knows any donors… but what’s this? The King has the same blood type?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: Leaving the safety of the Golden Country, Senshi ends up in the clutches of a ferocious griffin. The crew must summon help if they want to save him.Source: Netflix

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: After waking up to a tantalizing smell, Marcille receives a lecture from Senshi on a balanced diet. The crew helps an adventurer poisoned by a basilisk.Source: Netflix

programme.sub-title: Each One's Opening Curtain!! The Pantasia Newcomers' Battle Begins!
programme.desc: Both Kazuma and Kawachi have made it past the preliminaries and now the Rookie Competition has officially begun!Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: To Whom Will You Give Your Truly Delicious Bread!? The Ja-pan, Forever!

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Last Match of the Newcomers' Battle!! The Singing and Dancing French Breads!
programme.desc: Kawachi makes “Singing” French bread, while Suwabara rises to the challenge with his “Dancing” French bread. Will this match end with… a draw?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: The Ten Billion Yen Man?! Pantasia's Life or Death Crisis!

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc:
Laios and crew access a hidden area guarded by mysterious Living Armor, who appear to be protecting something potentially delicious.

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Though presumed inferior to Kurokiba's cartoccio and Hayama's carpaccio, Soma's pacific saury dish had been hiding a secret. Will Soma's strategy work to sway the judges

programme.title: Gourmet Girl Graffiti

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon
programme.desc: The crew avoid a stinging descent to the castle town, where the Red Dragon lurks. But to defeat it, they need a tight plan — and a morale-boosting meal.Source: Netflix

programme.sub-title: With a Little Prayer!! An Oath on the Grave!

programme.title: Drifting Dragons

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Inui Hinako, a Totsuki alumna, has tasked Soma's group with making a Japanese dish using available ingredients in the area. Anything other than condiments and spices must be procured from their immediate environs. Soma, provoked by Takumi Aldini's challenge, has a flash of inspiration and dashes out with Megumi to find ingredients for their dish!

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: One win for the Central and one win for the rebels! The shokugeki between Isshiki and Tsukasa reaches its climax! The theme was a classical French ingredient, rabbit meat. Isshiki’s dish manage to impress the judges but Tsukasa seems to be unmoved. Will Tsukasa be able to surpass Isshiki’s super aggressive dish?

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: Soma goes back home for the first time in a long while over an extended break. Stormed by people who were waiting for Yukihira to reopen, Soma decides to serve his customers. But among them are the leaders of the shopping district, who tell Soma that the shopping district is on its last breath as a new shopping complex at the train station steals all of their customers...

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
programme.desc: The Shokugeki between Mito Ikumi and Yukihira Soma has begun! Everyone, including Erina, is convinced that Ikumi, the Meat Master, will win. Soma, on the other hand, is greeted by jeers the moment he enters the arena. Will Soma be able to save Don RS?

programme.title: Yakitate!! Japan
programme.sub-title: I Won't Lose!! I Challenge You With my Osaka Bread!
programme.desc: Kawachi is continuing his training, but still hasn’t come up with an idea for what kind of bread he will submit for the contest preliminaries. Will he come up with something in time?Source: crunchyroll

programme.title: Delicious in Dungeon

programme.title: Food Wars! (Shokugeki no Soma)
